channel.title: CVE Feed for F5 -- BIG-IP DNS
channel.description: The latest CVEs for F5 -- BIG-IP DNS

item.title: CVE-2022-41787|2024-09-17T03:39:07.603Z -- f5 -- big-ip%20dns
item.description: In BIG-IP versions 17.0.x before 17.0.0.1, 16.1.x before 16.1.3.1, 15.1.x before 15.1.6.1, 14.1.x before 14.1.5.1, and 13.1.x before 13.1.5.1, when DNS profile is configured on a virtual server with DNS Express enabled, undisclosed DNS queries with DNSSEC can cause TMM to terminate.
